romy 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • getting_started

    Reference

    All functions

    .Q_func()

    Q function as described in Appendix B of Chen 2022.

    .S_operator()

    S operator as described in Appendix B of Chen 2022.

    .ace()

    This functions performs the alternating condition expectation algorithm, the outcome is the interaction term.

    .cF_func()

    F function as described in Appendix B of Chen 2022.

    .check_model()

    Prediction model checker

    .covar_testing_sub()

    This function computes the test statistic for (co)variance effects

    .covar_testing_sub_parallel()

    This function computes the test statistic for (co)variance effects, using parallel computation

    .create_no_split_data()

    no-cross-fitting-approach

    .create_splits()

    K-fold

    .dml_association_testing()

    This function computes the test statistics for double machine learning based association testing, given the residual measurements and index pairs.

    .dml_association_testing_parallel()

    This function computes the test statistics for double machine learning based association testing, given the residual measurements and index pairs. using parallel computations

    .evaluate_models_covar()

    This function evaluates the trained prediction models for (co)variance testing.

    .f_func()

    f function as described in Appendix B of Chen 2022.

    .get_residuals()

    Covariate adjustment and residual computation

    .get_residuals_and_predictions()

    Covariate adjustment and residual computation, including predictions as output

    .get_residuals_parallel()

    Covariate adjustment and residual computation using parallel computations

    .gradient_f_func()

    gradient f function as described in Appendix B of Chen 2022.

    .input_checks()

    Input check

    .is_categorical()

    helper function to determine if x has less or equal than 5 levels

    .na_safe_matrix_product()

    Matrix product with potential NA entries

    .nuclear_norm()

    Computes nuclear norm of Matrix Gamma

    .romy_lf_algorithm_gamma()

    Performs the proximal gradient descent algorithm as described by Chen 2022 (Appendix B).

    .train_models_covar()

    This function performs the training for (co)variance testing.

    lm_learner()

    Training of linear regression model

    lm_learner_q()

    Training of linear regression model

    lm_learner_simple()

    Training of simple linear regression model

    lm_predict()

    Prediction using linear regression model

    lm_predict_q()

    Prediction using linear regression model

    lm_predict_simple()

    Prediction using simple linear regression model

    mlr3_gam_learner()

    Training of GAM model

    mlr3_gam_predict()

    Prediction using GAM

    mlr3_lightgbm_learner()

    Training of lightgbm model

    mlr3_lightgbm_predict()

    Prediction using lightgbm

    romy_cit()

    ROMY-CIT

    romy_cov()

    ROMY-COV

    romy_inter()

    ROMY interaction testing

    romy_lf()

    ROMY-LF

    superlearner_binomial_learner()

    Training of SuperLearner for binomial link functions

    superlearner_binomial_predict()

    Prediction using SuperLearner (binomial link)

    superlearner_gaussian_learner()

    Training of SuperLearner for gaussian link functions

    superlearner_gaussian_predict()

    Prediction using SuperLearner (gaussian link)
